en: He is extremely good at investing.
She is extremely good at everything.
They are extremely good at dancing.
But my main reason is because he is a philanthropist.
ko: 근데 무엇보다도 그 분이 자선사업가시기 때문이야

en: But my main reason is because he is an entrepreneur.
ko: 근데 무엇보다도 그 분이 사업가시기 때문이야

en: But my main reason is because he is a professor.
ko: 근데 무엇보다도 그 분이 교수님이시기 때문이야
